means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 阿博特 Abbott的变体

sentence.Network_en: I wonder if I might have a word with Mr Abbot?
sentence.Network_cn: 请问我能否和阿博特先生说几句话？

sentence.Network_en: Abbot looked blank. "I don't quite follow, sir."
sentence.Network_cn: 阿博特一脸茫然。“我没听明白，先生。”

sentence.Network_en: All the priories were made directly subject to the abbot of Cluny.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有小修道院都由克呂尼的院长直接管理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 境外媒体多称少林寺为“Disney land”，就像他们称呼释永信为CEO，并非他们不知道怎么翻译“方丈”(Abbot)一词。用“CEO”只是一种讽 …
Vivekavana Solitude Grove 静修园 ... 静修 Self Retreat 住持 Abbot 帮忙 Help needed.
新概念第三册精解 ... pay off 还清，偿还 abbot: 修道院院长 convent nun: 修女.
abbeystead 修道院所在地abbot 修道院abbr. 缩写

Glossary | SOTOZEN-NET ... food for spirits 生饭) founding abbot 开山) founding ancestor 开祖).
[唐卡] 藏传佛教英文词汇 ... 493.Gampopa " 冈波巴" abbot's quarters 方丈室 * the Abhidharma-kosa-Shastra 俱舍论.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  abbod, from ecclesiastical Latin abbas, abbat-, from Greek abbas 'father', from Aramaic 'abbā (see Abba)

encyclopedia.content: 中文拼写：阿博特 名字含义：修道院院长，Abbott的异体 名字来源：希伯来语

entry.tran: 男修道院院长；大寺院男住持
entry.def: An abbot is the monk who is in charge of the other monks in a monastery or abbey.

means.word_mean: 1. the superior of an abbey of monks

auth_sentence.content: If satisfied, the officiating abbot admits the postulant.
auth_sentence.res_content: If satisfied, the officiating abbot admits the postulant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If satisfied, the officiating abbot admits the postulant.

auth_sentence.content: However she had done it, she had alerted the busy Abbot.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: However she had done it, she had alerted the busy Abbot.

auth_sentence.content: The...Abbot...commanded Halbert to rule his temper.
